amendment.description: To authorize $3,600,000 for military construction for the Air National Guard of the United States to construct an engine inspection and maintenance facility at Little Rock Air Force Base, Arkansas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4411 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4411 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6386) To authorize $3,600,000 for military construction for the Air National Guard of the United States to construct an engine inspection and maintenance facility at Little Rock Air Force Base, Arkansas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4411 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4411 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lincoln.
